decision_conditions: Prior Approval is required (given) in accordance with the details as provided within the application.

Prior to the occupation of the development, details confirming the legal right to use the approved area for the purposes of the refuse and recycling storage shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Authority.

Insufficient evidence has been provided with the application to judge the permission of the landowner to extend the existing refuse facility area for the use of the approved development. Submission of this detail prior to occupation will protect the amenity of occupiers of the development and also the locality generally.

Prior to the occupation of the development hereby approved, the refuse and recycling storage shall be provided in accordance with the approved plans. The refuse and recycling facilities shall be permanently retained thereafter.

Insufficient information has been supplied with the application to judge how refuse and recycling will be managed on site.  Submission of this detail prior to occupation will protect the amenity of occupiers of the development and also the locality generally.

None of the residential units shall be occupied until a scheme to secure their occupation as 'car-free' has been implemented in accordance with the Unilateral Agreement, which have first been signed and completed.

The restrictions and requirements of the scheme shall apply to and be communicated to all future residential occupiers of the development including successors in title as well as any person occupying the premises as a tenant or licensee.

Reason: To promote sustainable transport and to reduce pressure for on-street car parking in accordance with the requirements of policy 24 of the Local Plan (2021) and Policy T6 of the London Plan (2021).
The change of use as described in this Prior Approval notification must be commenced not later than three years from the date of this decision.
description: Application for Prior Notification of Change of use from retail shop (Use Class E) to 2 x 1-bed dwellings (Use Class C3)
